text: Heinz Klevenow Jr. (28 August 1940 – 3 March 2021) was a German actor and theatre director. His best known movie roles were in Entlassen auf Bewährung (1965) and Chingachgook, die große Schlange (1967). He was artistic director of the Puppentheater Halle from 1978 to 1982 and then at the theatre from 1989 to 2004. Klevenow Jr. died on 4 March 2021 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German theatre directors Category:Puppeteers Category:Actors from Prague
title: Heinz Klevenow Jr.
